Smart Tape Dispenser: A tape dispenser that uses sensors to detect the amount of tape left and automatically rewinds when necessary, preventing wastage.
Multi-Function Tape Dispenser: A tape dispenser that has multiple functions, such as a built-in scissors or a ruler, to make it a one-stop-shop for all your tape-related needs.
Portable Tape Dispenser: A compact and lightweight tape dispenser that can be taken on the go, making it perfect for DIY projects or quick fixes.
Tape Dispenser with Voice Control: A tape dispenser that can be controlled using voice commands, making it easy to use hands-free while working on a project.
Tape Dispenser with Augmented Reality: A tape dispenser that uses augmented reality to provide visual cues and instructions, making it easier to use and reducing the likelihood of mistakes.
